name: Mexican Lasagna
author: Alyce Voorhees
summary: My whole family loves this beefy lasagna flavored with taco seasoning. Even my picky five-year-old will eat it. Serve with shredded lettuce, fresh sliced tomatoes, olives and sour cream.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes with juice
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, brown the ground beef, and stir in the   and tomatoes
Line a 9x13-inch baking dish with half the tortillas
Spoon the beef mixture into the dish, then top with the remaining tortillas
Spread salsa over the tortillas and sprinkle with the cheese
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 20 to 30 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly
